FuncDef: The create virtual-partition command creates a virtual partition. The create virtual-partition command creates a virtual partition.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type of the partition to be created.
-

Creates a virtual partition for the root directory.
-

Specifies a slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Specifies the size of the virtual partition to be created.
The value is a 32-bit unsigned integer. The value range of the root path partition for application running is 1 to 102400, and the value range of the image storage partition is 1 to 2048.

Examples: Warning: The virtual partition will be created. Continue? [Y/N]:y
[~HUAWEI-oas] create virtual-partition size 2048 type rootfs slot 1
Warning: The virtual partition will be created. Continue? [Y/N]:y
